11.title: Fairy Tale

choices: Eat some more of the house
Go inside and eat what's in there
111.content:
Prince Charming is on a hunting party to capture wild game. He sees a deer off in the distance and readies his bow. He waits patiently for the right time to fire his arrow. He gets a perfect shot on the deer, when sudden noise causes the deer to run off. Charming disappointed and frustrated chases after the deer in hopes to get another chance to get the deer. He loses track of the deer and finds himself lost. He then smells a sweet aroma coming from one direction. He thinks that the person living in the house should be able to give him directions, or he might be able to figure out where he is once he reaches the house.

He gets to where the house is a sees a cottage made of sugars and sweets. He notices that this is the house where a witch once lived until she was murdered in her own fireplace. He now knows where to go...but the delicious deserts that build the cottage make Charming very hungry. "I guess it won't hurt to eat from this cottage with the witch dead and all." He takes a chocolate brick from the house and eats it. "Mmm that was good...but I'm still hungry.

11111.content:
Every day for the next week, Charming would go back to the house to eat some of it. He ate candy doorknobs, gummy pillows, cake couch stuffing, and anything in the house he could get his greedy hands on. He would enjoy his "snack", and usually end up with a small potbelly before heading back home.

He was careful to keep his eating a secret from Snow. He would wear heavy clothes just to hide his belly. He wasn't sure how long he'd be able to keep this a secret. Snow didn't seem to notice anything, and he was relieved by it.

He had noticed his body start to change. All that binging was having its effects on him, as he now had a chubby belly and a fuller ass. His chest was also puffier and his limbs weren't quite as slim as they used to be. Charming was aware of these changes, and he was...

1111112.content:
Charming got to the house, and he saw that it was even bigger than before. It was practically a mansion now, and everything was pristine and delicious-looking. Charming saw some delectable cookies being used for roof tiles, so he went to the top floor, where he saw a hatch leading to the top. He ate a bite out of the hatch itself, which was made of graham cracker, then he got to pulling off the cookies one by one, stuffing them in his greedy maw. He was pleasantly surprised to see that they were kept on there by frosting, and he scooped some up with his hand and ate it.

He then went back down to the top floor where he continued to feast on chocolate tables, gingerbread chairs, and candy windows. When all was said and done, his belly was distended even more than before, and his face was covered in stains. He gave a big belch before heading home. He wanted to stay at the house longer, but he knew that Snow would get suspicious.

It was at that moment that he thought of a wonderful lie. He thought of convincing Snow that he was going to go on a long trip to a far away kingdom. He would just tell her that the kingdom invited him to a ball, and he would make sure that she stays home to take care of the kids. That would free him up to stay at the candy house for a long time! When he got home...

"Well guess I should've known this would be the only food here, might as well sit down and eat some more."
Charming sits down in the middle of the dinning room and takes one of the giant blue cupcakes and starts eating. He finishes the cupcake with his face covered in some frosting. Charming' s hunger grows and he decides to take two more cupcakes and huge slice of cake. He finishes quickly covered in more frosting. He then goes to finish the rest of the cake and eat some of the ice cream. After that Charming feels a bit of tight around his waist. He then loosens his belt a little as a belly starts to plop out.
"Oh my how much did I eat I've gained like 10-15lbs...Snow's gonna be sooo mad. What should I do?

11122.content:
Charming soon feels sleepy and decides to take a nap on the candy cane bed, with a mattress that's made of gummy candy.
"Ha ha, this is such a odd bed, well I might as well sleep a bit after a long hunt and then go back to the castle"
Charming falls asleep and dreams. He then awakens to find himself strapped to the bed with taffy binding him to bed posts.

"Hey, what's going on?" says Charming as he struggles. He then sees a women similar to the witch that used to live in the cottage.
"Ha ha, I knew that the person who killed my sister would return."
"I didn't kill you sister that was Regina, the evil queen, who killed your sister."
"Yes, I know she's the one who killed my sister with her fire magic, but I know that she had an accomplice to help her."
"I do not know who is was that killed your sister but it wasn't-". The princess mouth is being blocked by a funnel used for feeding.
"Be quiet you, I've been hungry for awhile." She says as she rubs Charming's bloated belly. "And I think you'll be quite tasty." She says with a hungry smile.

Charming tries to speak, but is muffled from the funnel in his mouth and all the food the witch is feeding him. She continues feeding Charming until his belly is completely exposed and goes to get the ingredients ready for her dinner.
"Darn, I've forgotten to get things ready. I'll be right back my plump morsel." She says as she pinches Charming's cheeks and places an apple in his mouth so he can't yell for help and walks out the door.
Charming sees this as an opportunity to figure out a way to escape before the witch returns...

113.title: The Huntsman

1131.content:
The Huntman stood in front of Regina's throne. He stood there, nervous. He could feel sweat rolling down the back of his neck. He had failed another mission for the dark queen, and she didn't look happy at all. "You failed me again Huntman!" said Regina with a frown.

"Yes my queen! I..."said The Huntman, but he was cut off by Regina holding up her hand.

"No excuses! You still failed me and you need to be punished for it!" said Regina with a cruel smile on her face. She snapped her fingers, and the Huntman's shirt fell off,leaving his torso bare. Regina walked over to The Huntman and put her hand on him. "You have also been such a fit person. I see you working out in the courtyard every morning." said Regina, tracing his abs.

"Yes, my queen." said The Huntman, who's face was going red.

"I've decided what your punishment is. I am going to make you big and fat." said Regina with an evil smile, and before The Huntman could protest, Regina had already snapped her fingers, and there he was, tied to an old wooden chair in front of a table filled with all kinds of food, like pie and cakes and all other types of food. "Let begin!" said Regina from behind the Huntman as a pie slowly floated towards The Huntman's mouth, knowing that he didn't have a choice, he quickly ate the pie. Just as he finished, a cake came up to his
mouth and he eat that too.

12.title: Real World

121.content: With the day off to himself, David slumps down onto the sofa with nothing in mind but to watch TV, do nothing and effectively slob out.However one thing which is not on the plan is to pig out... that is, until his thin stomach begins to rumble. At first the young man ignores it, seeing it as nothing more than his imagination. After about 30 minutes of concentrating more on the rumbles of his stomach than on the programmes (sport) on the TV, he decides that enough is enough and he will see what is in the kitchen. He is amazed to find a treasure trove of snacks (potato chips, candy and other fatty, junk foods), beer and more of the former in abundance. He drags all of it into the front room and places the collection of foods piled either side of him. The man placed his big, booted feet onto the table. Underneath are white socks. His muscular torso is covered by a dark blue button down shirt, and he has tight jeans on. Looking at the food, he decides he really doesn't want to eat it all by himself (though he is still ravenously hungry). He calls Sherrif Graham, inviting him over for snacks and beers. The sheriff...
121.title: David Nolan

1211.content:
Sheriff Graham answers the phone.

"Hello Sheriff Graham speaking?"

"Hello Sheriff, this is David Nolan I was wondering if you weren't busy and would like to hang out here, i have snack btw?"

"Sure Ms. Swan should be here any minute and I'll head over, ok?"

"Ok, Sheriff I'll cya later"

David hangs up the phone and stares at the food. He grows really hungry. "I guess he wouldn't mind if I start eating without him. He sits there watching the sports program and he grabs the bag of potato chips and eats the whole bag in a matter of minutes. David is surprised that he eats the whole bag and grabs another bag and eats that one at a fast pace as well.David laughs," I must be really hungry if I've eaten two bags already in such a short amount of time. This time grabs a bag of Cheetos and eats those. After finishing half of the bag he hears the doorbell ring. He gets up with some difficulty and answers the door. Sheriff Graham answers the phone and hears that it is David Nolan.

“Sheriff Graham here. Can I help you David? “asked the sheriff as he wondered what did David want.

“I have some snacks so do you have time to hang out?” answered David hoping that the sheriff could hang out with him.

“Sorry David. I have a lot of work to do maybe an another time like later this week?” said the sheriff as he looked on his desk and inwardly groan as he saw the large pile of paperwork waiting for the sheriff to go through them.

“Sure, see ya later “said David as he hung up the phone.

He then went to the kitchen and pulled opened a cabinets filled with takeout menus. info.brief_description: This is a weight gain for the male characters of abc's Once Upon A Time
info.description: So this is a weight gain story for the guys of the popular ABC show Once Upon A Time. You can choose to make them gain in either the fairy tale world or the real world. Stuffing is acceptable but please no "he gained 500 pounds in one day". No gore or popping cuz that's just nasty. You can make them gain as much as you want but please keep it realistic and remember GUYS ONLY!
